titleInfo.title: Evelyn Rosenthal Stone and Max Rosenthal in Electrical Store

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#628 Max Rosenthal and daughter Evelyn Rosenthal Stone in elec shop, c. 1930''. On back of photograph: ''#628 Augus 26, 1930 Evelyn Rosenthal Stone and Max Rosenthal in Electrical Store''.

mods.abstract: Interior of electrical store with Max Rosenthal and his daughter Evelyn Rosenthal Stone.
